title: Perfect ip
body:
That feeling when you have the perfect amount of ip to buy a champ
[](http://file:///C:/Users/HP/Saved%20Games/Capture.PNG)

replies.body: that feeling when you have 123 RP on two accounts..

feeling when someone has 9876 rp on a banned account and then that person pisses them selves trying to get revenge on riot

or that feeling when someone buys $25 rp then 5 seconds later that account gets perma ban
any chance that might be you?
i dont pay for a "free to play" game, with free being the key work
